cast.overview: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.
cast.title: The Matrix

details.biography: Jeremy Ball was an Australian actor and politician. He graduated from the National Institute of Dramatic Arts in 1995 with a degree in Dramatic Arts. In 2007, he was the elected to the City Council of Launceston, in the island state of Tasmania. He was elected Deputy Mayor of Launceston in 2011, and held the position until his death in 2014.
details.name: Jeremy Ball
